title: 【命令方块】如何制造出一个带着皮肤头颅的隐形怪物？
author: lqx123
txt_content:
如题，做解密地图的必要环节，急求啊！！！
最好能在此帖回复详细指令或是方法，实在不行提供帖子也行啊！！！

replies.author: a13870136617
replies.txt_content:
a13870136617 发表于 2014-8-30 20:34
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ 
{ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:9999999,Ambient:1}],
Attributes:[{Name:gene ...
头颅名字可以自定义

replies.author: 北美路人
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 熄灭的火把 于 2014-8-30 21:22 编辑 

/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:9999999,Ambient:15}],Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:-1},{Name:generic.followRange,Base:350}],Equipment:[{id:267,tag:{AttributeModifiers}[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:-1.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:No_Attack}]}},{id:313},{id:312},{id:311},{id:397,Damage:3,tag:{SkullOwner:头的名字}}]}
